member_organisations: EASSH has no individual membership but only disciplinary organisations and universities. All our members (so far) are on our website http://www.eassh.eu/members
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Culture, Education and training, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: EASSH is engaged with science policy field. EASSH is involved with Open Science, European Research Area and Research infrastructures
organisation_name: European Alliance for Social Sciences and Humanities (EASSH)
belgium_office_address: Rue de Trone 61 c/o Bergen University Office
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: EASSH is an umbrella organisation for research policy in the field of Social Sciences and Humanities
relevant_communication: EASSH works to support funding for research in SSH and our organisations are involved actively in research projects. As an umbrella organisation, EASSH has not yet been involved in any specific project. All our publications and communications are on our website www.eassh.eu
